languages.text: "Еще раз замечу хоть тень обвинений от тебя — освежую живьем".
"If I notice even the slightest hint of insinuation from you again, I'll have you flayed alive."
languages.original_text: "Еще раз замечу хоть тень обвинений от тебя — освежую живьем".

traits.locale_text: "If I notice the slightest shadow of insinuation from you again, I'll have you flayed alive."
"If I notice the slightest shadow of insinuation from you again, I'll have you flayed alive."
"If I notice even the slightest hint of insinuation from you again, I'll have you flayed alive."
"If I notice even the slightest hint of insinuation from you again, I'll have you flayed alive."
"If I notice even the slightest hint of insinuation from you again, I'll have you flayed alive."
"If I notice even the slightest hint of insinuation from you again, I'll have you flayed alive."

languages.text: « Si je décèle encore une fois la moindre insinuation de votre part, je vous ferai écorcher vif. »
languages.original_text: "If I notice even the slightest hint of insinuation from you again, I'll have you flayed alive."

traits.locale_text: « Si je décèle encore une fois la moindre insinuation de votre part, je vous ferai écorcher vif. »

languages.text: «Como vuelva a oírle la más mínima insinuación, ordenaré que le arranquen la piel a tiras».
languages.original_text: "If I notice even the slightest hint of insinuation from you again, I'll have you flayed alive."

traits.locale_text: «Como vuelva a oírle la más mínima insinuación, ordenaré que le arranquen la piel a tiras».

languages.text: “要是再让我感觉到你话里有话，我就立刻活剥了你的皮。”
languages.original_text: "If I notice even the slightest hint of insinuation from you again, I'll have you flayed alive."

traits.locale_text: “要是再让我感觉到你话里有话，我就立刻活剥了你的皮。”

languages.text: 「少しでも侮蔑の影が見えたら、生きたまま皮を剥いでやるからな」
languages.original_text: "If I notice even the slightest hint of insinuation from you again, I'll have you flayed alive."

traits.locale_text: 「少しでも侮蔑の影が見えたら、生きたまま皮を剥いでやるからな」

languages.text: "Wenn ich auch nur den leisesten Hauch von Ungehorsam erkenne, lasse ich Euch bei lebendigem Leib häuten."
languages.original_text: "If I notice even the slightest hint of insinuation from you again, I'll have you flayed alive."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich auch nur den leisesten Hauch von Ungehorsam erkenne, lasse ich Euch bei lebendigem Leib häuten."

languages.text: "Eğer sende en ufak bir ima ibaresi daha fark edersem canlı canlı derini yüzdürürüm."
languages.original_text: "If I notice even the slightest hint of insinuation from you again, I'll have you flayed alive."
